amendment.description: Page 1201, line 14, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $1,000,000) (increased by $1,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to provide $1,000,000 to PHMSA for the finalization of an automatic valve shut-off safety rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Carbajal.
